name: Lithuanian robotics association
membership:
euRobotics aisbl (http://www.eu-robotics.net)
Lithuanian of Industry 4.0 platform (http://www.industrie40.lt/platform/)
goal:
We are growing the robotic business in Lithuania by making Lithuanian robotic sector well known to the international players

We are creating local networks and placing to work together across the value chain

We are prioritizing robotics sector and addressing national policy challenges, that restrict from pursuing robotics growth potential
interests: Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives:
Digital Single Market Strategy
Digitising European Industry initiative
EU Industrial Policy Strategy
European Platform of National Initiatives on Digitalisation
New Skills Agenda for Europe
Networks of Digital Innovation Hubs
